Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield City Council, Neighbourhood and Community Care Directorate. Provides information on vacancies available in local authority and registered residential care homes and nursing homes in Sheffield. The information includes if the bed is at funding level or above and the type of vacancy (eg if single or shared room). For older people only.
